page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENTS:GIRLS GAMES
page.content: {BLUE TOUCH}: THE OBJECT OF{BLUE TOUCH} IS FOR ONE PERSON TO CATCH THE OTHER PLAYERS BEFORE THEY CAN TOUCH SOMETHING BLUE.THE BLUE OBJECT MUST NOT BE IN THE PLAYERS CLOTHES.THIS GAME IS PLAYED OUTSIDE AND THE PLAYERS RUN FROM ONE BLUE OBJECT TO ANOTHER. {DIGGING GOLD}: THERE ARE THREE PLAYERS EACH WITH A SPACE MARKED {GOLD MINE} AND THERE ARE NINE BAGS OF GOLD.YOU HAVE TO RUN TO THE OTHER GOLD MINES AND GET THEIR GOLD.THE WINNER IS THE PERSON WHO GETS THE MOST BAGS OF GOLD FROM THE OTHER TWO PLAYERS WITHOUT HAVING HIS OWN STOLEN.{ {INVADERS}:THERE ARE TWO SEMI CIRCLES DRAWN ON THE GROUND ONE PERSON IS THE CATCHER. THE PLAYERS HOP FROM ONE AREA TO ANOTHER WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT BY THE CATCHER. IF THEY ARE CAUGHT THEY BECOME THE CATCHER. ANY NUMBER OF PEOPLE CAN PLAY.
